content:
EntitySet<TEntity> Class

In this Article

Provides for deferred loading and relationship maintenance for the collection side of one-to-many and one-to-one relationships in a LINQ to SQL applications.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class EntitySet<TEntity> : System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<TEntity>, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<TEntity>, System.Collections.Generic.IList<TEntity>, System.Collections.IList, System.ComponentModel.IListSource where TEntity : class

Type Parameters

TEntity

The data type of the target entity.

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • EntitySet<TEntity>

Inherited Members

,

,

,

ToString()

Remarks

This class is used in combination with EntityRef<TEntity>.

Constructors summary

EntitySet<TEntity>()

Initializes a new instance of the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 class.
EntitySet<TEntity>(Action<TEntity>,Action<TEntity>)

Initializes a new instance of the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 class while supplying handlers for add and remove operations.

Properties summary

Count

Gets the number of entities in the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 collection.

Specifies whether the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 has loaded or assigned a value.
IsDeferred

Specifies whether this stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 has a deferred query that has not yet executed.

  • EntitySet<TEntity>(Action<TEntity>,Action<TEntity>)

    Initializes a new instance of the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 class while supplying handlers for add and remove operations.

    public EntitySet (Action<TEntity> onAdd, Action<TEntity> onRemove);

    Parameters

Properties

  • Count

    Gets the number of entities in the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 collection.

    public int Count { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      An integer representing the number of entities.

  • HasLoadedOrAssignedValues

    Specifies whether the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 has loaded or assigned a value.

    public bool HasLoadedOrAssignedValues { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns true if the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 has either loaded or assigned a value.

    Remarks

    "Loaded" means that the data was loaded during materialization or at deferred loading. "Assigned" means that you have manually given the data a value.

  • IsDeferred

    Specifies whether this stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 has a deferred query that has not yet executed.

    public bool IsDeferred { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if a deferred query has not yet been executed; otherwise false.

    • index

      The index of the element.

    Property Value

      An stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 representing the item.

      TEntity

      The entity.

    Returns

      true if the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 contains the entity; otherwise, false.

  • CopyTo(TEntity[],Int32)

    Copies the stem.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1 to an array.

    public void CopyTo (TEntity[] array, int arrayIndex);

    Parameters

    • array
      TEntity[][]

      The array to copy to.

    • arrayIndex
      Int32

      The starting index in the array.

    Remarks

    The following C# sample shows one use of this method: 

    var customer = (from c in db.Customers  
   where c.CustomerID == "ALFKI"  
   select c).Single();  

Order[] orderArray = new Order[customer.Orders.Count];

    customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray,0);In Visual Basic: 

    Dim customer = (From c In db.Customers _   
   Where c.CustomerID = "ALFKI" _   
   Select c).[Single]()  

Dim orderArray As Order() = New Order(customer.Orders.Count - 1) {}  
customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray, 0)
